body.title: DOM4J The Flexible XML Framework for Java

header.p: DOM4J is a powerful and flexible Open Source XML framework for Java.
DOM4J combines the best of DOM, JDOM and SAX to provide a flexible and powerful framework for parsing, navigating, creating and processing XML data.
DOM4J is a simple interface based API together with configurable plug and play tree implementations and fully integrated XPath navigation.
